name: Bradwell's Old Fashioned Vanilla 1Ltr (L)
description: Vanilla flavour ice cream, smooth, rich and buttery
Bradwell's Ice Cream lovingly made in the Peak District since 1899.
The Butter Rich Classic Dairy Ice Cream Range from Bradwells.

Bradwells Dairy Ice Creams' original founder Hannah, lovingly made all her legendary ice cream, by hand with the finest ingredients, in her front parlour. At  a time when there was no electricity, she used ice, brought in by trains from Sheffield to the Peak District village of Bradwell. Today over a hundred years later, Bradwells Ice Cream is locally produced in the village and enjoyed across Derbyshire and Yorkshire.
Also available in the Classic Range 1L:
Chocolate, Raspberry Ripple, Creamy Strawberry, Butterscotch, Toffee Fudge, Rum & Raisin and Chocolate Mint.
ingredients: Emulisfier: Mono and Di-Glycerides of Fatty Acids
Stabilisers (Carob Gum, Guar Gum, Sodium Alginate, Carrageenan)
PromotionDescription: 50p off Tesco branded ice cream and gelato (includes Tesco finest* and Everyday Value)
